code: export var BASE_URL="https://register.nomoreparties.co";function returnRes(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}else{return Promise.reject("Error: ".concat(res.status));}}export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return returnRes(res);}).then(function(res){return res;}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return returnRes(res);}).then(function(data){if(data.token){localStorage.setItem("token",data.token);return data;}else{return;}}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var checkToken=function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return returnRes(res);}).then(function(data){return data;});};
